text: Martin Luther King III (born October 23, 1957) is an American human rights activist and philanthropist. He is the oldest son and oldest living child of civil rights leaders Martin Luther King Jr. and Coretta Scott King. King was the 4th President of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference from 1997 to 2004. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American civil rights activists Category:American human rights activists Category:American philanthropists Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Montgomery, Alabama Category:Writers from Montgomery, Alabama Category:Martin Luther King Jr.
title: Martin Luther King III
